titleStmt.title: Neptunes address to His most Sacred Majesty Charls the second: King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, &c. Congratulating his happy coronation celebrated the 22th. day of Aprill, 1661. In several designements and shews npon [sic] the water, before White-hall, at His Majesties return from the land-triumphs.
titleStmt.author: Tatham, John, fl. 1632-1664.
